header.title: I am Fabio Estevez
header.subtitle: Fullstack Web & Mobile Developer
paragraph: +3 years of experience developing digital solutions
that transform ideas into functional products.
Implementation of modern and responsive websites for clients from various sectors.
SEO and performance optimization to improve user experience.
Development of a mobile app to systematize internal operations.
Designed and structured the complete client interface.
Participation in the creation of a healthcare portal in Argentina.
Implementation of internationalization, forms, and optimization of visual resources.
Contributed to the creation of key modules for a restaurant app.
Development of components, routes, and global state management.
Creation of technology and gaming content, reaching an active digital community.
Experience in digital marketing, video editing, and audience management.

content.title: Sanatorio Colegiales
content.paragraph: Implemented banners faithful to the original design, dynamic routes, internationalization system, and advanced forms, optimizing images to improve site performance and speed.

content.title: Creative Tools
content.paragraph: Created a website to store and share resources for developers and designers, with favorites system, rating, advanced filtering, and intuitive modular organization.

about.title: About Me
paragraph: My name is Fabio Andrés. My journey with code started at 16 and took an unexpected path through technical support and creating YouTube videos. That journey, which enriched my perspective, eventually guided me back to my original goal: to be a developer who builds solutions with the user always in mind.

That experience gave me a unique understanding of user needs and the ability to communicate ideas clearly. Today, I apply those lessons in my obsession with creating functional and intuitive software, writing clean and efficient code that solves real problems.
